title: LSTM Stock Price Prediction
description: A neural network-based stock price prediction system using Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks. Built as a final project for CS 682 Neural Networks course at UMass Amherst. Implements a multi-layer LSTM architecture with dropout regularization, layer normalization, and early stopping for predicting daily stock closing prices.
highlights: Multi-layer LSTM architecture with 4 LSTM layers and dropout regularization
Custom PriceClassifier class for stock price prediction and evaluation
Train/validation/test split with temporal data handling
Early stopping callback to prevent overfitting
Visualization of predicted vs actual stock prices
Mean squared error evaluation metrics
Support for layer normalization and configurable hyperparameters
Jupyter notebook implementation with comprehensive analysis

title: Astrology Insights
description: A full-featured web application for generating detailed astrological birth charts with AI-powered interpretations, interactive chat, and synastry analysis. Built with Flask, PostgreSQL, and integrated with OpenAI/Anthropic for personalized chart readings.
highlights: Interactive birth chart generation with Kerykeion API
AI-powered chart interpretations using GPT-4/Claude
Interactive chat for asking questions about charts
Synastry reports for relationship analysis
Google OAuth authentication
Stripe payment integration for premium features
PostgreSQL database for chart storage and chat history
Admin dashboard for user management

title: mattmccarthy.dev
description: A modern, responsive personal website built with Flask and Tailwind CSS featuring blog, projects showcase, and interactive resume.
highlights: Markdown-based blog system
Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
Interactive resume with timeline view
Projects showcase with filtering

title: Thrive Beyond Coaching
description: A modern, responsive website for Thrive Beyond Coaching LLC - dynamic coaching for cancer survivors and their loved ones. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS with a warm, supportive design.
highlights: Next.js 14 with App Router and TypeScript
Responsive design with warm, supportive earthy/nature theme
Multiple pages: Home, About, Offerings, Shop, and Contact
Contact form integration with Formspree
Playwright testing suite for quality assurance
Production deployment with optimized performance
